DescriptionMain: In this FINAL step, please take some time to review the project for accuracy before submitting.
DescriptionSub: Click on any of the sections to return to the corresponding step and make changes. Once a project is submitted as final in this step, only a Guardian administrator can unlock the project for additional editing.
Label: Label
NotyInfo: Your project has been successfully saved and submitted for review.
AreYouSureMain: Are you sure? Once submitted, this project will be locked and no longer editable
AreYouSureSub: except by a Guardian support administrator.
ProjectIncomplete: This project has Steps that are incomplete and cannot be submitted. Please review the progress bar to see which step is incomplete.
SuperConfidential: We have detected that some of the content you are submitting is registered as super confidential. As a result of this we will set the project to private and mask all of the content submitted.
